name: Alchemy Dash
description:
Alchemy Dash is a project entirely made by Daniel Maida. It's an endless runner where you control a little alchemist that possesses the power of the elemental stone.
You will use the endless power of the elemental stone to solve puzzles in real time as you run like hell. But be careful, if you choose the wrong element you can suffer the horrible consequences. Also, the purple monsters don't die (Just because the game developer is a sadistic bastard). 

The game has a retro feel and it's intended to be fun and fast paced.

Controls:

  • Up Arrow - Jump
  • A - Burn them all
  • S  - Wash their sins
  • D - Blow them away
  • Space - The earth is your shield 

I hope you guys like it!
